pr_title: [BC-221] Disconnect peers advertising an invalid finalized epoch

timeline.message: Disconnect peers advertising an invalid finalized epoch

timeline.bodyText: I think this will give us the slot of the best bock, not the current slot.  So if we haven't completed sync this would be a slot from the distant past and we'd disconnect most peers.  I think we want to use get_current_slot(store) which will give us the slot based on the time, not what blocks have been imported.
